# This script relies on `systemd` commands.
# Update Salt config sudo salt-call state.sls common.salt.master.update_config test=False sudo salt-call state.sls common.salt.minion.update_config test=False
# TODO: Capture errors from Salt. # At the moment it does not return exit/error code. # See: https://github.com/saltstack/salt/issues/18510 # SOLUTION: Use this script: # states/bootstrap/bootstrap.dir/modules/utils/salt_output.py
# Start Salt services with new config. sudo systemctl restart salt-master # Pause for 5 sec. ping -c 5 salt sudo systemctl restart salt-minion # Pause for 5 sec. ping -c 5 salt
